title: Authors and Citation
text: Saloni Vijay. Author, maintainer. Hope Kelvin Chilunga. Author. Lennox Khonje. Author. Jack Kamjombo. Author. Elizabeth Tilley. Author. Lars Schöbitz. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Vijay S, Chilunga H, Khonje L, Kamjombo J, Tilley E, Schöbitz L (2024). “bcsa: Package (One Line, Title Case).”
code: @Misc{vijaychilunga,   title = {bcsa: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {Saloni Vijay and Hope Kelvin Chilunga and Lennox Khonje and Jack Kamjombo and Elizabeth Tilley and Lars Schöbitz},   year = {2024},   abstract = {The bcsa package provide datasets for source apportionment of light absorbing carbon (LAC) in Blantyre, Malawi. The package contains data on Absorption Angstrom Exponent experiments determination of local pollution sources. The package also contains data on spatial distribution and ambient concentrations of LAC concentrations. This study used the MA200 micro-aethalometer to measure the LAC concentrations. The MA200 measures the LAC concentrations in real-time at five different wavelengths, that allows for source apportionment.},   version = {0.0.0.9000}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal bcsa provide datasets source apportionment light absorbing carbon (LAC) Blantyre, Malawi. package combines datasets collected part two projects. first project determining Absorption Angstrom Exponent (AAE) values local pollution sources Blantyre, Malawi. AAE values can used differentiate LAC fossil fuel biomass based sources. second project determine light absorbing carbon concentrations mobile, personal stationary monitoring Blantyre. package includes following seven datasets: df_aae: Data experiments determine AAE values df_mm: Mobile monitoring data eight settlements df_mm_road_type: Mobile monitoring data classified highways (main_road) non-highways (non_main_roads) eight settlements df_pm: Personal monitoring data four settlements df_pm_trips: Data times open waste burning observed personal monitoring df_sm: Raw data stationary monitoring two settlements Data two LAC monitors placed run next check data quality study used MA200 micro-aethalometer measure light absorbing carbon (LAC) concentrations. MA200 measures LAC concentrations real-time five different wavelengths, allows source apportionment.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version bcsa GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table .

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: data package seven datasets: df_aae df_mm df_mm_road_type df_pm df_pm_trips df_sm df_collocation

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: dataset contains data experiments determine AAE values local pollution sources Blantyre, Malawi. Vehicular emission Waste Burning (Plastics) Waste Burning (Plastic-based textiles, e.g., polyester) Waste Burning (Garden Waste) Waste Burning (Cardboard Paper) Mixed waste burning Cooking (Using Solid Biofuels - Wood, Charcoal, Briquettes) data mentioned collected 17 days, 16th May 1st June, 2023. Vehicular emissions: three diesel pick-trucks sampled. exhaust monitored MA200, positioned approximately 3 meters vehicle’s exhaust, vehicle engine started. Monitoring conducted 20 minutes. Also, mobile monitoring carried three heavily trafficked roads peak traffic hours, duration 20 minutes road. Open waste burning emissions (individual components burning): various waste components (plastics, textiles, cardboard paper, wood, leaves) burned semi-open guard shelter. shelter, covered three sides open one side, allowed burning edge open side. MA200 monitor positioned 3-meter distance open side, micro-cyclone attached MA200 placed 1.5 meters ground. amount waste components burned carefully determined trial error, ensuring concentrations remained within desired levels burning sufficient duration. consistent 20-minute burning duration chosen align vehicle monitoring. waste type burned three replicates, minimum half--hour gap experiment, shelter ventilated. Mixed waste burning: six known mixed waste dumps across city monitored, 20-minute duration. Cooking emissions: MA200 placed guardian shelter Queens, known using firewood cooking. micro-cyclone positioned 1.5 meters ground 3 meters front windows section shelter. Sampling conducted 20 minutes three days peak cooking times. df_aae data set 21 variables 1199 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Mobile monitoring data eight settlements Blantyre, Malawi. data collected eight settlements (four planned four unplanned settlements. Mobile monitoring utilised vehicle equipped portable MA200 instrument. micro-cyclone positioned outside car’s front window elevation 1.5 meters ground. vehicle driven speed less 20 km/h. monitoring took place 3rd May 14th May, 2023, covering weekdays weekends. df_mm data set 23 variables 3956 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: dataset collected mobile monitoring df_mm, except highways non-highways demarcated dataset. df_mm_road_type data set 25 variables 3540 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Personal monitoring data four unplanned settlements Blantyre, Malawi, covering areas inaccesible vehicles due narrow undefined unpaved roads. personal mobile monitoring, individual carried monitoring equipment conducted -foot surveys within informal settlements. micro-cyclone attached collar person. method implemented twice settlement, 9:00 .m. 11:30 .m. 2:00 p.m. 4:30 p.m., 19th 25th May, 2023, covering weekdays. df_pm data set 23 variables 1108 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: conducting personal monitoring, individual also recorded times open waste burning. times individual observed burning events given dataset. df_pm_trips data set 11 variables 81 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: capture ambient concentration diurnal pattern LAC, stationary monitoring conducted two specific areas, one planned one unplanned. monitoring campaign spanned 13th July 22nd August winter season. df_sm data set 21 variables 20756 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: quality assurance, two sensors collocated multiple times throughout study: twice mobile monitoring, twice AAE experiments, stationary monitoring. df_collocation data set 21 variables 6037 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

The package also contains data on spatial distribution and ambient concentrations of LAC concentrations. This study used the MA200 micro-aethalometer to measure the LAC concentrations. The MA200 measures the LAC concentrations in real-time at five different wavelengths, that allows for source apportionment.}, #>     version = {0.0.0.9000}, #>   }
